title: Renovated 2x1 Near Downtown Santa Rosa-W/D & AC in unit
posting_body: ['Renovated 2x1 Near Downtown Santa Rosa', '2-BEDS', '1.0 -BATHS', 'RENT- $2,395', 'show contact info', '<URL>', 'PROPERTY ADDRESS', '871 Sonoma Avenue,', 'Santa Rosa, CA 95404', 'SQUARE FEET: 810', 'AVAILABLE 09/05/2022', 'DESCRIPTION', 'Parc Sonoma, located near Downtown Santa Rosa, is now', 'offering renovated two bedroom, one bath apartments for rent.', 'The property is in a park like setting and offers units that are', 'clean, bright, have a washer and dryer and gas stainless-steel', 'appliances.', 'Unit Highlights:', '- All new stainless steel refrigerator, stove and dishwasher', '- Full sized stacked washer and dryer', '- Large kitchens with spacious countertops, sinks, new faucets,', 'and garbage disposal', '- New paint throughout unit with all new tall baseboards and door', 'trim', '- New vinyl windows', '- Laminate wood floors', '- All new light fixtures, ceiling fans, and door hardware', 'throughout each unit', '- Built-in shelving unit in Living Room', 'Property Highlights:', '- Two assigned parking spaces (one carport + one tandem', 'space)', '- Private detached storage unit for each unit', 'Location Highlights:', '- Convenient location minutes from Downtown Santa Rosa,', 'located near shopping, dining and more!', '- Located in the coveted Rincon Valley Unified School District,', 'the highest ranking district in Santa Rosa and recognized as one', 'of the best in the State of California', 'PET POLICY', '• Cats allowed', '• Dogs allowed', '• Pet Deposit $500.00 per pet', '• Monthly Pet Fee $35.00  -per pet', 'RENTAL TERMS', 'Rent $2,395', 'Security Deposit $1,000', 'Application Fee $35', 'Please visit our website to apply - <URL>/']
